sentences.en: Due dates for all drafts are listed on the course syllabus.
sentences.cn: 所有草稿的交稿日期都可以在教学时程中看到.

sentences.en: Have you got next year's syllabus?
sentences.cn: 你拿到明年的教学大纲了 吗 ?
我把上课进度表发下去.

sentences.en: If applying for exemptions, have you attached syllabus details?
sentences.cn: 如要申请免修科目, 你是否递交了附页详细说明?
查士丁尼采纳了一份新的教学大纲.

sentences.en: My teacher introduced herself before passing out her syllabus.
sentences.cn: 在发进度表前,老师先自我介绍.

sentences.en: Refer to your syllabus for a detailed description of this assignment.
sentences.cn: 参考对此作业已详加说明的课程大纲.

sentences.en: Schools should attach syllabus related to the applied trades for reviewing.
sentences.cn: 学校应检附与申请评鉴职类相关科系之课程表.

sentences.en: See the'Assignments'section of the syllabus for further guidance.
sentences.cn: 进一步的说明请见教学大纲中的作业.

sentences.en: The course syllabus consisted mainly of novels by African-American authors, male and female.
sentences.cn: 该课程的教学大纲主要包括了非裔美国男女作家的小说。

sentences.en: The educational videos are designed to fit into the syllabus.
sentences.cn: 这些是为配合课程大纲而制作的教学录像带.

sentences.en: The school syllabus seems aimed at the lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 学校的教学大纲似乎是针对接受能力最差的学生制定的。

sentences.en: The syllabus may vary depending on the faculty member teaching the course.
sentences.cn: 教学大纲将会依不同的教授授课而有变更.

sentences.en: The writers on the syllabus consistently try to imagine a way to make those claims, make those claims for the primacy and the importance of what they do.
sentences.cn: 大纲里的作家一直在尝试,设想出一种方法来提出要求，把他们写的书放在首要地位,使他们的要求得到重视。

sentences.en: These cannot be the required books on the syllabus.
sentences.cn: 这些不能是教学大纲中的必读书籍.

sentences.en: True or False A syllabus is an outline of the instructor's course.
sentences.cn: 真或假的教学大纲是课程纲要教师.

sentences.en: We must try to diversify the syllabus to attract more students.
sentences.cn: 我们应该使教学大纲内容多样化,可以多吸引学生.

trans.tran_cn: 教学大纲，课程提纲，（讲义等的）摘要，提纲，课程表，[法]（判例前的）判决要旨
trans.tran_en: a plan that states exactly what students at a school or college should learn in a particular subject
